Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees European and Japanese buyers: Taxes will be asked in the destination country. Please inquire at your local Customs Office before ordering as you will have to pay extra charges upon arrival of the parcel in your country Guitar comes with Brown Gibson Case in excellent condition Overall Condition: - Guitar is cosmetically very close to mint. - Frets are in excellent plus condition and neck is straight - All electronics work as they should - Very small surface scratches from playing - One very small factory imperfection on the binding on the rounded part of the body Specifications: - Weight: 9 lbs, 1 oz - Bound Ebony Fingerboard - 490R and 498T Pickups - AAAA figured maple top and back - Grover Tuners - Gold Hardware - '60 neck - No electronics Cavity Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
Title: 2006 Gibson Les Paul Supreme Root Beer with HSC
